backend/main.mo: Canister implementing user profiles, playlist management, and access-controlled queries and updates using in-memory maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of various frontend files for documentation and build reference.
frontend/docs/pulse-player.md: Documentation outlining the app’s UI, navigation, interactions, and major screen behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining theme variables and styling tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React application entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component setting up theming, player context, and the app shell.
frontend/src/app/layout/AppShell.tsx: Main layout handling tab navigation, offline banner, mini player, and page rendering.

frontend/src/components/branding/AppBran: Header with theme-based hero background, logo, and app title.
frontend/src/components/loading/Indexing: Skeleton loader used while local media files are being indexed.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Bottom navigation bar for switching between music, video, library, and settings tabs.

frontend/src/features/library/LocalMedia: Shows an alert stating that media is stored locally and works offline.
frontend/src/features/library/searchSort: Implements search and sorting helpers for tracks and videos by name, size, or date.
frontend/src/features/library/useLibrary: Loads, indexes, and stores audio and video tracks in IndexedDB, extracting metadata and tracking loading states.

frontend/src/features/recommendations/re: Generates recommendations by scoring tracks using favorites and listen history.
frontend/src/features/recommendations/Re: Displays recommended tracks or fallback empty state based on user activity.
frontend/src/features/recommendations/us: Computes recommendations from library, favorites, and history with memoization.
frontend/src/features/settings/PlaybackS: Renders playback settings UI, currently enabling gesture controls.
frontend/src/features/settings/usePlayer: Loads and saves player settings such as gesture controls to IndexedDB.

frontend/src/features/video/EmptyVideoSt: Shows an empty-state screen prompting users to add videos.

frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode, and utility classes.

frontend/src/lib/media/metadata.ts: Extracts basic media metadata from files, including inferred titles and durations.

frontend/src/pages/VideoPage.tsx: Lists local video files and allows selecting and viewing a video in a player.
